I have been having an issue with the max-time-sec property.  I am
testing using 120 seconds, since I do not want a crawl to last more
than two minutes.  Anyway sometimes it seems to work correctly other
times, the scan will end almost immediately saying that the Timelimit
was hit, even though I know it wasn't.  Any thoughts?

~chris
